dashboard.anonymityDescription: ## Connect to servers and visit websites using different IP addresses## to protect your real location from being tracked. It's like wearing a double mask for more secure privacy. Note: May slightly affect speed, Pro Exclusive features.
dashboard.autoSwitchExplanationGeneral: Automatically select and switch to the best available node based on network conditions
dashboard.autoSwitchExplanationSpecific: Automatically switch to other available nodes in this country based on network conditions
dashboard.autoSwitchInfo: The system automatically switches to other available nodes in the country depending on the network conditions
dashboard.autoSwitchLabel: Automatically switch to other nodes in this country based on network conditions
dashboard.concurrentDescription: ##Use multiple nodes ### at the same time to make connections faster and more stable. It's like traveling on multiple roads at once; if one is blocked there are others to travel. Especially effective when ## networks are limited ## Pro Exclusive feature.
dashboard.connectionRetrying: Server connection failed, trying to retry...
dashboard.muxDescription: ##Lower latency and faster speeds##. One channel transmits multiple requests at the same time, like opening up multiple lanes on a highway, ### reducing queuing and waiting time##. Suitable for watching videos, gaming and other scenarios.
dashboard.noNodesDescription: No tunnel nodes found. Please check your network connection and try refreshing.

ruleDescription.chnroute: Extremely fast access to local websites

dashboard.selectServerHint: Select a server from the list below to get started

retailer.becomeRetailerDesc: Invite users to pay and get cashback commission, easy to realize passive income
retailer.becomeRetailerTitle: Become a distributor and earn promotional income
retailer.description: You are a distributor and can earn cashback from paid orders of invited users

retailer.rulesShortDescription: Find out how to get cashback rewards

retailerRule.agreement: Continued use of the Distribution feature indicates that you have read and agree to all of the above terms.
retailerRule.disputeResolution: If you have any questions or disputes about the distribution rules, please contact customer service to deal with them in time
retailerRule.finalInterpretation: The final interpretation of these rules belongs to the Platform
retailerRule.freezePeriod: Freeze period: cashback amount needs to be frozen for 30 days after arrival before withdrawal (to prevent the risk of refund)
retailerRule.refundDeduction: Refund Processing: If the user applies for a refund, the corresponding cashback amount will be deducted from your wallet.
retailerRule.ruleModification: The Platform reserves the right to amend the Distribution Rules at any time, and the amended rules will take effect immediately after publication.
retailerRule.settlementCycle: Settlement cycle: cashback amount in real time to the wallet, after the expiration of the freezing period is automatically converted to withdrawable balance
retailerRule.settlementRules: Rules for the settlement of funds
retailerRule.withdrawalAccount: Withdrawal account: you need to add and verify the payee address in "Wallet Management" first.
retailerRule.withdrawalFee: Withdrawal fee: borne by the distributor (the specific fee depends on the payment channel, generally 3-5% of the withdrawal amount)
retailerRule.withdrawalTime: Processing Time: Withdrawal requests will be processed within 14 days.
